text: The New Armenia Public Salvation Front is an opposition party to the Republican Party of Armenia, led by Lebanese-born Armenian Jirair Sefilian. In June 2016, Sefilyan and six of his supporters were arrested and accused of preparing to seize government buildings and telecoms facilities in the capital, Yerevan. ==References== Category:Political parties in Armenia Category:Political parties with year of establishment missing
title: New Armenia Public Salvation Front
